events.name: login failure
events.description: Unsuccessful attempt to login to couchbase cluster

events.name: add node
events.description: Node was added to the cluster

events.name: remove node
events.description: Node was removed from the cluster

events.name: setup node services
events.description: The services were set for the node

events.name: reset auto failover count
events.description: Count for Auto Failover was reset

events.name: reload node certificate
events.description: Reload node certificate chain and pkey from inbox

events.name: configured audit daemon
events.description: loaded configuration file for audit daemon

events.name: mutate document
events.description: Document was mutated via the REST API

events.name: set user group
events.description: User group was added or updated

events.name: set user profile
events.description: UI profile was added or updated

events.name: read document
events.description: Document was read via the REST API

events.name: alert email sent
events.description: An alert email was successfully sent

events.name: session timeout
events.description: User session has ended due to a timeout

events.name: authentication failure
events.description: REST operation failed due to authentication failure

events.name: access forbidden
events.description: REST operation failed due to insufficient permissions

events.name: user locked/unlocked
events.description: User was either locked or unlocked

events.name: set encryption key
events.description: Encryption key was created or modified

events.name: request fusion state
events.description: Changing of fusion state was requested
